code: import axios from'axios';export var getTodoFunction=function getTodoFunction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_REQUEST'});axios.get("http://localhost:3004/todos").then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_SUCCESS',payload:res.data});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_ERROR'});});};};export var addTodoFunction=function addTodoFunction(title){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_REQUEST'});return axios.post('http://localhost:3004/todos',{title:title}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'ADD_TODOS_SUCCESS',payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_ERROR'});});};};export var deleteTodoFunction=function deleteTodoFunction(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_REQUEST'});return axios.delete("http://localhost:3004/todos/".concat(id)).then(function(){dispatch({type:'REMOVE_TODO',payload:id});}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_ERROR'});});};};export var editTodoFunction=function editTodoFunction(id,newText){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_REQUEST'});return axios.put("http://localhost:3004/todos/".concat(id),{title:newText}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'EDIT_TODO',payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:'GET_TODOS_ERROR'});});};};
